title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 630.3 - Determination of eligibility for services in the OPWDD system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 630.3 - Determination of eligibility for services in the OPWDD system

State Regulations
OPWDD shall determine whether individuals meet the criteria
established in section
1.03
(22)
of the Mental Hygiene Law and are
therefore eligible to receive services in the OPWDD system. OPWDD
determinations shall be in accordance with the eligibility determination
process described in "Eligibility for OPWDD Services" which is inserted into
section
630.5
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
630.3

Amended

New

York State Register November 15, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 46, eff. 11/15/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
